Experience

Tutors undergraduate students in algebra, trigonometry, calculus I-III, and general physics. Assists multiple students simultaneously in understanding mathematical and physical concepts. Oversaw improvement in scores in students that consistently attended tutoring sessions.

Interests

When I'm not in lecture or lab, I enjoy going to the beach, watching movies, and trying new food with my family. On free weekends, we enjoy roadtrips down to San Diego, CA or up to Florence, OR.
